in the region.  The southern area of

2,992 billion VND divided into two phases, of
which phase one is 15 hectares of
general cargo capacity.  300,000 to 400,000

Import-export container yard,

the atmosphere in yw became more peaceful
as the authorities increased

in public places to avoid a repeat tragedy.  There were
no Halloween decorations.
Instead, this year the street was filled with

paper expressing condolences to the
victims, most of whom were in their 20s and 30s.
Gatherings were not banned.  at itw during

last year's storm. I feel safer
when I see many new security guards
around.  Recently, the capital city government

crowd control exercise to test the effectiveness
of a new surveillance system with nearly 1,000
surveillance cameras in 71 locations.
This system will be able to analyze the level of  of
the crowd's ability to move in
real time, thereby giving warnings to the
authorities about dangerous signs. The

the methane gas leak recorded at the

Teito, a unit of the global steel manufacturing corporation.
asom mitan operates this mine 206
of the 252 people present at the time of

stop cooperating with arelo mitan T Mito. This
is the second fatal incident in 2

another accident, the Sumatran tiger is a species facing
extinction with
only a few hundred left in the wild.
Therefore, the fact that a Sumatran tiger in the
US gave birth to three cubs is a
great motivation for  Conservationists of this animal species at
Nasin Bang Teni Zoo announced that they have just
welcomed three new members of the Ho Sumat family.
Zoo staff weighed them, measured them,
and examined their health on Thursday,
October 27.  gave birth to three cubs, two
females and one male, on October 20.
This is the first time this 7-year-old mother
gave birth and is also the
first Sumatran tiger cubs born at Nasin
Zoo. Sumatran tigers often live in  in Indonesia
and is currently an endangered species due to loss of habitat
as well as excessive hunting.
Scientists estimate that there are only about
400 to 600 sumatran lakes left living in the wild.
Asian Para Games  The fourth Asean Paragames taking
place in Hangzhou, China,
officially ended last night. The closing ceremony at
Hangzhou Olympic Sports Center Stadium took place for 1 hour
with rich cultural performances.
Similar to the Asad 19 opening and closing ceremonies
last month, the
Asean paragame closing ceremony included
art performances combined with technology. A
total of 213 disabled artists participated in
performances on the speaking field.  Closing ceremony,
Chairman of the Asian Paralympic Committee mar called
this the largest and most successful Asean paragame
ever, the
fourth Asan Paragames in Hangzhou took
place in 6 days with 501 competitions
in 22 sports disciplines.  This year's event recorded
21 world records, 72 Asian records and
more than 260 records. Host
China topped the list with a total of
521 medals, including 214
gold medals, ranked second and third.  are Iran
and Japan Tho Vietnam organization ranked
22nd with one gold medal, 10
silver medals and only bronze medals the
fifth aan paragame will take place in
